Posts.Content: Oct 26, 2010 03:23AM Ann68 wrote:  I had my first Mammogram and Ultra Sound done this past Friday ( Oct 22 ) in a Screening Clinic in Southern Ontario.  In early October my family doctor found a lump and ordered the test's.  All weekend I have been a wreck.  I was told the results could take up to 2 weeks, does it really take that long and is it normal to be this stressed.  My husband says I am worrying for nothing ?
